def calculate_chat_positions(n, m, queries):

    class BIT:

        def __init__(self, n):
            self.tree = [0] * n
            self.N = n

        def add(self, i, value=1):
            (N, tree) = (self.N, self.tree)
            while i < N:
                tree[i] += value
                i |= i + 1

        def sum(self, r):
            (N, tree) = (self.N, self.tree)
            result = 0
            while r > 0:
                result += tree[r - 1]
                r &= r - 1
            return result
    bit = BIT(n + m)
    pos = list(reversed(range(n)))
    for i in range(n):
        bit.add(i)
    mins = list(range(n))
    maxs = list(range(n))
    for (i, q) in enumerate(queries):
        q += 1
        p = pos[q]
        bit.add(p, value=-1)
        mins[q] = 0
        maxs[q] = max(maxs[q], n - 1 - bit.sum(p))
        p = n + i
        bit.add(p)
        pos[q] = p
    for (i, p) in enumerate(pos):
        maxs[i] = max(maxs[i], n - 1 - bit.sum(p))
    result = [(mins[i] + 1, maxs[i] + 1) for i in range(n)]
    return result
